India/Sep 23, 2025‘India a pivotal voice’: UN chief Guterres backs calls for UNSC reform; wants council to represent ‘world of 2025, not 1945’UN secretary-general Antonio Guterres supports UNSC reform to mirror current global dynamics, acknowledging India's growing influence. While the decision on permanent membership rests with member states, India actively seeks a seat, emphasizing its qualifications. The UN also voices concerns about rising global protectionism and its detrimental effects on global development and economic stability.

sports.content: Sports/Sep 23, 2025'Tu na sudhri, bas chakke maari jaayi': Watch Abhishek's net session with YuvrajA viral video showcases Abhishek Sharma honing his skills under Yuvraj Singh's mentorship, emphasising situational awareness alongside aggressive hitting. Abhishek's father credits Yuvraj's guidance for his son's development, focusing on team success. This mentorship bore fruit in India's victory over Pakistan, where Abhishek's explosive innings and record-breaking six-hitting cemented his position as a formidable T20I batter.

Sports/Sep 23, 2025'Six-hitting ability is god-gifted': Abhishek’s father credits Yuvraj for son's riseAbhishek Sharma, known for his effortless six-hitting, showcased his talent against Pakistan with a blistering 74 off 39 balls. Mentored by Yuvraj Singh, Abhishek combines natural flair with strategic gameplay. His journey from U-19 cricket to IPL stardom has prepared him for the international stage, where he aims to win matches for India.
